name: v1.2.0
body:
# WARNING
* this release is the first release using androidX, stay with older versions for pure appcompat dependencies

# Changes
* includes all updates from the rc pre releases
* update to final androidX 1.0.0 release
* update to final material theme 1.0.0 release

name: v1.2.0-rc01
body:
# WARNING
* this release is the first release using androidX, stay with older versions for pure appcompat dependencies

# Changes
* upgrade to androidX 
  * use bridge themes to support old appcompat too
* update to build tools 28
* update to targetSdk 28
* include material dependency
* update to the new release setup used in my other libs
* update to gradle 4.9
* cleanup

name: v1.1.2
body:
**library**
* fix crash if trying to resolve a simple color from theme 
  * FIX mikepenz/MaterialDrawer#2089

name: v1.1.1
body:
**library**
* update build tools, compile, target and supportLibs
* use implementation for dependencies

name: v1.1.0
body:
* fix StringHolder nullpointer
  * FIX #17
* improve color resolving from theme

name: v1.0.1
body:
**library**
- Use the animate parameter THANKS @timoschwarzer

name: v1.0.0
body:
**library**
- **DROP API 10 support. new minSdk: 14**
- update to latest support libraries v24.2.0

name: v0.9.0
body:
**library**
- change to target SDK 24
- change to compileSDK 24
- change to buildTools 24
- change to supportLibs 24
- update to gradle 2.14

name: v0.8.8
body:
**library**
- update to latest support libraries v23.3.0

**general**
- update to latest gradle 2.12
- update to latest android gradle build tools v2.0.0

name: v0.8.7
body:
**library**
- also allow PressedEffectStateListDrawable with a selected icon
- properly tint icons for pre lollipop devices

**sample**
- update sample app dependencies

name: v0.8.6
body:
**library**
- update to latest android support library v23.2.1

name: v0.8.5
body:
**library**
- update to latest appcompat v23.2.0
- add DayNight themes

**general**
- update to gradle 2.11

name: v0.8.2
body:
**library**
- only set the FLAG_DRAWS_SYSTEM_BAR_BACKGROUNDS on API >= 21
  - this fixes a Samsung bug on Android 4.3. Thanks @fabianterhorst for reporting and debugging it
- we need a container for the second case, throw exception if none is provided
- system ui invisible is only possible starting with API >= 16

name: v0.8.1
body:
**library**
- add getScreen Width/Height methods
- add new method to the UiUtils

name: v0.8.0
body:
**library**
- add setFitsSystemWindows to IScrimInsetsLayout
- the ScrimInsetsFrameLayout should have fitsSystemWindows true
- remove unnecessary methods and logic
- split up some functionality
- more flexible
- this release is another step forcing the dev to follow the plattform defaults to get proper styling
- a no translucent activity should have a style without translucent status

name: v0.7.1
body:
**library**
- bottom margin should be managed by the devs themself

name: v0.7.0
body:
**library**
- we only want the TranslucentStatusBar and NavigationBar managed on APIs > 21 as this release aims for a more (platfrom) standard approach
- fix getSelectableBackground will fail if the drawable is fetched via the contextCompat

name: v0.6.0
body:
**library**
- add ScrimInsetsRelativeLayout
- use ContextCompat for getColor
- add new behavior to the `.build()` function which will not add a `ScrimInsetsView`

name: v0.5.2
body:
**general**
- add jcenter support
- update to gradle 2.10
- move appcompat versions to root build.gradle

**library**
- add android annotations
- use ContextCompat to get color
- add new useful methds to UIUtils

name: v0.5.1
body: - add getter and setter to the holder

name: v0.5.0
body:
- Update md_light_background to Grey 50 **THANKS** @plusCubed 
- add grey_850 which is the specification for the dark background as defined in the material design guidelines http://www.google.com/design/spec/style/color.html#color-themes
- add some more default color specifications as of the design guidelines
- fix default color specifications as defined in the google material design guidelines
- add holder classes
- add more dimens default values

name: v0.2.8
body: - update to latest android support libraries v23.1.1

name: v0.2.7
body: - change to R.attr.actionBarSize this will fix a wrong returned height

name: v0.2.6
body: - update to the latest appcompat v23.1.0

name: v0.2.5
body: - add new API to hide the systemUI completely

name: v0.2.2
body: - add new SystemUIVisible flag for the ScrimInsetsLayout to fix broken behavior in landscape

name: v0.2.1
body:
- update appcompat support lib
- update build tools
- update android gradle plugin
- update dependencies of sample app

name: v0.2.0
body:
- update to the latest v23 support libs, build tools, target sdk
- update to use gradle v2.5 for building

name: v0.1.3
body: - fix AboutLibraries definition file

name: v0.1.1
body: - update appcompat to v22.2.1

name: v0.1.0
body: - first public release
